messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 779
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 9/6/2000 8:58:38 PM Pacific Daylight Time, ... --erin ... I guess we all better watch ourselves with this business of reading corrections
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 9/6/2000 8:58:38 PM Pacific Daylight Time,
MorelFam@... writes:

> <<rural enough that we have beer>>
> >
> > LOL, woops lynda. glad you are rural enough for beer there! whew!
--erin
> >>
> actually, i think "beer" was intended to be "deer," "bear" was included
> later
> in the sentence...
>
>
I guess we all better watch ourselves with this business of reading
'corrections' into the typos, huh? LOL

Eiraul

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 779
messages.msgSnippet: We have deer also.  In fact, the kidlets managed to get pictures of triplets not to long ago.  The place where the Cadillac and Lincoln commercials was shot is
messages.messageBody:
We have deer also. In fact, the kidlets managed to get pictures of
triplets not to long ago. The place where the Cadillac and Lincoln
commercials was shot is down the road a piece and that's where they saw the
triplets. We've also had them in our front yard.

Lynda

----------

messages.msgSnippet: Pris ~ laughing @ herself :) ... actually, i think
messages.messageBody:
<< haha and here I THOUGHT you made an ole TYPO yourself, Lynda ... I read
bear, not BEER ... <SMIRK>

Pris ~> laughing @ herself :)

> <<rural enough that we have beer>>
>
> LOL, woops lynda. glad you are rural enough for beer there! whew! --erin
>>
actually, i think "beer" was intended to be "deer," "bear" was included later
in the sentence...
